DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY BRIEFLY : CORTEX BEGINS HUMAN TRIALS OF ALZHEIMER ' S DRUG
DOC.TEXT: Cortex Pharmaceuticals Inc. has started human clinical trials with a drug it is developing for treatment of memory_loss resulting from Alzheimer ' s disease . The firm said the study of its Ampakine product is aimed at gaining knowledge of the safety of the compound on humans . The study , being conducted in Berlin , involves 48 people and will last about six weeks . Earlier this year , the company reported that tests of Ampakine on rats showed that animals treated with the drug performed significantly better than untreated animals .
